title: ATTA Biogeochemistry
description: Datasets collected as part of the collaborative projects studying the impact of leaf cutter ants (Atta cephalotes) on biogeochemical cycling in tropical rainforest soils.

creators.affiliation: College of Saint Benedict and Saint John's University
creators.name: Ana Grace Alvarado

creators.affiliation: University of Puerto Rico: Rio Piedras
creators.name: Yorelyz Rodriguez-Reyes
